name: Arnold Schwarzenegger
content: The last three or four reps is what makes the muscle grow. This area of pain divides a champion from someone who is not a champion.

name: Muhammad Ali
content: I don't count my sit-ups. I only start counting when it starts hurting because they're the only ones that count.

name: Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson
content: Success isn't always about greatness. It's about consistency. Consistent hard work leads to success. Greatness will come.

name: Michael Jordan
content: I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.

name: Marcus Aurelius
content: The impediment to action advances action. What stands in the way becomes the way.

name: Serena Williams
content: I decided I can't pay a person to rewind time, so I might as well get over it.

name: Ronnie Coleman
content: Everybody wants to be a bodybuilder, but nobody wants to lift no heavy-ass weights.

name: Bruce Lee
content: I fear not the man who has practiced 10,000 kicks once, but I fear the man who has practiced one kick 10,000 times.

name: Kobe Bryant
content: The most important thing is to try and inspire people so that they can be great in whatever they want to do.

name: Simone Biles
content: I'd rather regret the risks that didn't work out than the chances I didn't take at all.

name: Seneca
content: It is not because things are difficult that we do not dare, it is because we do not dare that they are difficult.

name: Usain Bolt
content: I trained 4 years to run 9 seconds, and people give up when they don’t see results in 2 months.

name: David Goggins
content: Don't stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done.

name: Aristotle
content: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.

name: Michael Phelps
content: If you want to be the best, you have to do things that other people aren't willing to do.

name: Tom Platz
content: The body you want, the life you want, is on the other side of 'I don't feel like it.'

name: Epictetus
content: First say to yourself what you would be; and then do what you have to do.

name: Cristiano Ronaldo
content: I am not a perfectionist, but I like to feel that things are done well. More important than that, I feel an endless need to learn, to improve, to evolve.

name: Jocko Willink
content: Discipline equals freedom.

name: Vince Lombardi
content: The only place success comes before work is in the dictionary.

name: Michelle Obama
content: For me, exercise is more than just physical—it's therapeutic.

name: Lee Haney
content: Exercise to stimulate, not to annihilate. The world wasn't formed in a day, and neither were we. Set small goals and build upon them.

name: Tom Brady
content: If you don't believe in yourself why is anyone else going to believe in you?

name: Lao Tzu
content: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.

name: C.T. Fletcher
content: I don't wanna be a wanna be, I wanna be what I'm destined to be. I will it to be. I demand it. It's my command.

name: Floyd Mayweather Jr.
content: No one is faster than me. No one is stronger than me. No one is smarter than me.

name: Sun Tzu
content: Victorious warriors win first and then go to war, while defeated warriors go to war first and then seek to win.

name: Martina Navratilova
content: The difference between involvement and commitment is like ham and eggs. The chicken is involved; the pig is committed.

name: Eliud Kipchoge
content: No human is limited. When you have that in your mind, you can do anything.

name: Confucius
content: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

name: Rich Froning Jr.
content: In training, you listen to your body. In competition, you tell your body to shut up.

name: Wayne Gretzky
content: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.

name: Jack LaLanne
content: Your body is your most priceless possession. You've got to take care of it.

name: Henry Ford
content: Whether you think you can, or you think you can't – you're right.

name: Frank Zane
content: The more you're obsessed by something, the better chance you have of achieving it.

name: Lewis Hamilton
content: My dad always said, 'Never give up, and always be the best you can be.' That's something that I've always lived by.

name: Plato
content: Lack of activity destroys the good condition of every human being, while movement and methodical physical exercise save it and preserve it.

name: Jackie Joyner-Kersee
content: The medals don't mean anything and the glory doesn't last. It's all about your happiness. The rewards are going to come, but my happiness is just loving the sport and having fun performing.

name: Arnold Schwarzenegger
content: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths. When you go through hardships and decide not to surrender, that is strength.

name: Arnold Schwarzenegger
content: A true icon of physical and mental fortitude. Arnold transformed himself from a young Austrian bodybuilder into a 7-time Mr. Olympia champion, a Hollywood superstar, and the Governor of California. His journey is a testament to the power of a clear vision, relentless discipline, and an unbreakable work ethic.
